name: Fwosty Poetwy
description:
Fwosty Poetwy!

The pwequel to Pwumpkin Poetwy!  Join Snow  Bear on Holiday's eve and listen to the fur-folk of Ice Town recite their famous Holiday poems! Take a brisk trot through town, listen to jammin tunes on your owoPod, and read a collection of fweezing, fwosty poetwy!

It’s a short game with a handful of possible endings, so please take your time and soak it all in! :3

BTW! If you like the soundtrack, you can download it and support me (uwu) by clicking this link! Right here! [the soundtrack will be uploaded ASAP!]

[Click Here For All My Socials!]

If you enjoy the game, please leave a rating! <3
